TextView.android:text: Sheet Pan Sausage and Egg Breakfast Bake Ingredients 4 uncooked breakfast sausages (6 oz total) 4 slices bacon 8 oz. small cremini mushrooms, halved or quartered if large 16 Campari or cocktail tomatoes, halved 2 cloves garlic, finely chopped 1 tbsp. olive oil Kosher salt and pepper 4 large eggs 1/2 c. flat-leaf parsley, chopped Toast, for serving Directions Heat oven to 400Â°F. On large rimmed baking sheet, roast sausages and bacon, 15 minutes. In large bowl, toss mushrooms, tomatoes, and garlic with oil and a pinch each of salt and pepper. Add to baking sheet and roast 10 minutes. Make wells among vegetables and crack 1 egg into each space; return to oven and roast until meat is cooked through and egg whites are opaque throughout, 8 to 10 minutes more. Sprinkle with parsley and serve with toast if desired.
